# instructr Package: 
The goal of `instructr` is to provide functions to reccord the screen with ffmpeg to be
    able to show script execution.

## Installation

You can install `instructr` from GitHub with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("muschellij2/instructr")
```
